name: Midnight
trait: Can launch Ranged Attacks that deal 80% of normal ATK

talent.name: Targeting - Primary
talent.desc: When attacking has a chance to increase the current damage of that attack by a percentage

skills.desc: +ATK%; Damage dealt by Normal Attacks turn into Arts damage

base skill: When this Operator is assigned to a Trading Post, order acquisition efficiency +30% and Morale consumed per hour -0.25
When this Operator is assigned to a Factory, Originium formula related productivity +30%
